item.title: Putin Proposes One More Year of Nuclear Caps With U.S.
item.description: Mr. Putin said Russia didn’t want to provoke a strategic arms race with the United States.

item.title: As U.N. General Assembly Gathers, Here’s What to Watch For
item.description: A look at major figures who will appear during the week and what they might talk about.

item.title: The Firing of Educators Over Kirk Comments Follows a Familiar Playbook
item.description: Conservative efforts to call out and punish educators over liberal ideas have grown for years, led in part by Charlie Kirk himself.
